item.title: MCP UI: Breaking the text wall with interactive components
item.description: ðŸš€ MCP UI is transforming AI interactions in commerce by enabling agents to deliver interactive UI components. This open-source protocol enhances the shopping experience with features like product selectors and image galleries, addressing the limitations of text-only communication. MCP UI uses an intent-based messaging system to maintain agent control while providing dynamic user experiences. Explore the Shopify Storefront MCP UI Server prototype for a firsthand look! ðŸ›’âœ¨ #ECommerce #AI #MCPUI…
